body: Update the openspeedshop and cbtf related package versions and update openspeedshop/cbtf patches to libmonitor.   This is an update to the versions/branches for OpenSpeedShop (application performance tool) and libmonitor's openspeedshop related patches.  Also, unify the elf requirements.
title: Update the openspeedshop and cbtf related packages including patches to libmonitor
